idea-plugin.name: Green Coding Assistant
idea-plugin.description: This project is a PyCharm plugin prototype designed to act as a "Green Coding Assistant," helping developers write energy-efficient Python code. It combines real-time static analysis (using eco-code-analyzer) to highlight code inefficiencies directly in the editor as you type, with runtime emissions tracking (using CodeCarbon) to measure and display the actual carbon footprint of your script after it runs.

action.description: Calculates estimated carbon footprint of the Python code
